name: Drunk Uncle (Scotch and Cynar Cocktail)
description: Peaty Scotch, such as Laphroaig, gives this drink a woodsy character that's emphasized by swapping the standard Campari for Cynar, a vegetal, bittersweet liqueur.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces (45ml) Islay Scotch whisky, such as Bowmore or Laphroaig

recipeInstructions.text: Add vermouth, Cynar, and Scotch to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with grapefruit twist and serve immediately.
